Detailed Description

template<typename T, int SIZE = sizeof(T), typename SYNC = RWSync<T, SIZE>>
class ctk::GlobalPtr< T, SIZE, SYNC >

Global Pointer template (The caller can set appropriate SYNC policy template to customize the behavior; the available templates are: RWSync, RSync, WSync, NoSync)
